SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.ui.gui.sceneControllers

Class SceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.ui.gui.sceneControllers.SceneController
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreatorController, ErrorController, GameFlowController, LoginController, PawnSelectionController, SecretMissionChoiceController, StarterCardChoiceController, WaitingController, WinnerController
public abstract class SceneController extends Object
This abstract controller contains methods and attributes used by all the controllers. It contains the methods to update the chat and set the common layout.

      labelMessage - name to be shown in group chat

      Parameters:
